scripts.clean: lerna exec --stream -- git clean -f -d -X && git clean -f -d -X
scripts.clean:pnpm: lerna exec --stream -- rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && rimraf pnpm-lock.yaml && pnpm clean
scripts.ncu:minor: ncu -t minor -u && lerna exec --stream -- ncu -t minor -u
scripts.prepare: rimraf .husky && husky install && husky add .husky/commit-msg "npx commitlint --edit $1" && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lerna run lint" && husky add .husky/pre-commit "npx lerna run format" && husky add .husky/pre-commit "pnpm ts-prune"
scripts.update: pnpm ncu:minor && pnpm i && pnpm ncu:major
